name: NotaryJurisdictions_PutNotaryJurisdiction
description:
Updates the jurisdiction information about a notary.

The following restrictions apply:

- The current user must be a notary.
- The `jurisdictionId` path parameter must be a jurisdiction that the notary is registered for.
- The `jurisdictionId` path parameter must match the request body's `jurisdiction.jurisdictionId`.

The request body must have a full `jurisdiction` object for the jurisdiction property.
The best way to do this is to use `getNotaryJurisdiction` to obtain the current values and update the properties you want to change.

For example, assume `getNotaryJurisdiction` returns this:

```
{
    "jurisdiction": {
        "jurisdictionId": "15",
        "name": "Iowa",
        "county": "",
        "enabled": "true",
        "countyInSeal": "false",
        "commissionIdInSeal": "true",
        "stateNameInSeal": "true",
        "notaryPublicInSeal": "true",
        "allowSystemCreatedSeal": "true",
        "allowUserUploadedSeal": "false"
    },
    "commissionId": "123456",
    "commissionExpiration": "2020-08-31T07:00:00.0000000Z",
    "registeredName": "Bob Notary",
    "county": "Adams",
    "sealType": "system_created"
}
```

If you want to change the name of the notary from "Bob Notary" to "Robert Notary", your request body would be:

```
{
    "jurisdiction": {
        "jurisdictionId": "15",
        "name": "Iowa",
        "county": "",
        "enabled": "true",
        "countyInSeal": "false",
        "commissionIdInSeal": "true",
        "stateNameInSeal": "true",
        "notaryPublicInSeal": "true",
        "allowSystemCreatedSeal": "true",
        "allowUserUploadedSeal": "false"
    },
    "commissionId": "123456",
    "commissionExpiration": "2020-08-31T07:00:00.0000000Z",
    "registeredName": "Robert Notary",
    "county": "Adams",
    "sealType": "system_created"
}
```

jurisdictionId.description:
The ID of the jurisdiction.
The following jurisdictions
are supported:

-  `5 - California`
-  `6 - Colorado`
-  `9 - Florida`
-  `10 - Georgia`
-  `12 - Idaho`
-  `13 - Illinois`
-  `14 - Indiana`
-  `15 - Iowa`
-  `17 - Kentucky`
-  `23 - Minnesota`
-  `25 - Missouri`
-  `30 - New Jersey`
-  `32 - New York`
-  `33 - North Carolina`
-  `35 - Ohio`
-  `37 - Oregon`
-  `38 - Pennsylvania`
-  `40 - South Carolina`
-  `43 - Texas`
-  `44 - Utah`
-  `47 - Washington`
-  `48 - West Virginia`
-  `49 - Wisconsin`
-  `62 - Florida Commissioner of Deeds`

commissionExpiration.description: The expiration date of the notary's commission in format: `MM/DD/YYYY`.

commissionId.description: The notary's commission identification. This varies from jurisdiction to jurisdiction.

county.description: The county that the commission is valid in.

registeredName.description: The registered name of the notary.

sealType.description:
The seal type used for this juridiction.

- `not_available`
- `system_created`
- `user_uploaded`

errorDetails.description: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

errorCode.description: The code associated with the error condition.

message.description: A brief message describing the error condition.

errorDetails.x-ms-summary: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

jurisdiction.description:
Describes the jurisdiction of a notary.
This is read-only object.

allowSystemCreatedSeal.description: When **true,** the seal can be generated by the platform.

allowUserUploadedSeal.description: When **true,** the seal can be uploaded by the user.

commissionIdInSeal.description: When **true,** the notary's `comissionId` appears in the seal.

countyInSeal.description: When **true,** the county name appears in the seal.

jurisdictionId.description:
The ID of the jurisdiction.
The following jurisdictions
are supported:

-  `5 - California`
-  `6 - Colorado`
-  `9 - Florida`
-  `10 - Georgia`
-  `12 - Idaho`
-  `13 - Illinois`
-  `14 - Indiana`
-  `15 - Iowa`
-  `17 - Kentucky`
-  `23 - Minnesota`
-  `25 - Missouri`
-  `30 - New Jersey`
-  `32 - New York`
-  `33 - North Carolina`
-  `35 - Ohio`
-  `37 - Oregon`
-  `38 - Pennsylvania`
-  `40 - South Carolina`
-  `43 - Texas`
-  `44 - Utah`
-  `47 - Washington`
-  `48 - West Virginia`
-  `49 - Wisconsin`
-  `62 - Florida Commissioner of Deeds`

name.description: The name of the jurisdiction. Typically the state name.

notaryPublicInSeal.description: When **true,** the name of the notary appears in the seal.

stateNameInSeal.description: When **true,** the name of the state appears in the seal.

jurisdiction.x-ms-summary:
Describes the jurisdiction of a notary.
This is read-only object.

$ul: **commissionExpiration**: The expiration date of the notary's commission in format: `MM/DD/YYYY`.
**commissionId**: The notary's commission identification. This varies from jurisdiction to jurisdiction.
**county**: The county that the commission is valid in.
**errorDetails**: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.
**errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
**jurisdiction**: Describes the jurisdiction of a notary.
**allowSystemCreatedSeal**: When **true,** the seal can be generated by the platform.
**allowUserUploadedSeal**: When **true,** the seal can be uploaded by the user.
**commissionIdInSeal**: When **true,** the notary's `comissionId` appears in the seal.
**county**: The county of the jurisdiction.
**countyInSeal**: When **true,** the county name appears in the seal.
**enabled**: When **true,** this jurisdiction is enabled.
**jurisdictionId**: The ID of the jurisdiction.
**name**: The name of the jurisdiction. Typically the state name.
**notaryPublicInSeal**: When **true,** the name of the notary appears in the seal.
**stateNameInSeal**: When **true,** the name of the state appears in the seal.
**registeredName**: The registered name of the notary.
**sealType**: The seal type used for this juridiction.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
